zh.title: 🤖 EasyAgent 智能体
zh.description: EasyAgent是一个基于langchain的Planning Agent，接入了网页搜索、股票查询、arxiv数据库等MCP工具
zh.api_warning:
⚠️ 请先在设置页面配置您的Deepseek API Key

请点击左侧导航栏的 🐋 Deepseek 进行配置
zh.api_format_warning:
⚠️ 请设置格式正确的Deepseek API Key，例如sk-xxxxxxx

请点击左侧导航栏的 🐋 Deepseek 进行配置
zh.task_help: 清空当前页面内容，创建新任务
zh.instruction_1: 1. 在输入框中输入，Agent会为您规划任务
zh.instruction_2: 2. 非流式输出下响应时间可能较长
zh.instruction_3: 3. 仅用于学习研究，不适用于实际交易
zh.api_key_note:
所有远程托管MCP使用的均是限额的默认API_KEY

如遇问题或需添加其他工具，请在mcp_config.json中修改

en.title: 🤖 EasyAgent Agent
en.description: EasyAgent is a Planning Agent based on langchain, integrated with web search, stock queries, arxiv database and other MCP tools
en.api_warning:
⚠️ Please configure your Deepseek API Key in the settings page first

Click on 🐋 Deepseek in the left navigation bar to configure
en.api_format_warning:
⚠️ Please set a correctly formatted Deepseek API Key, e.g. sk-xxxxxxx

Click on 🐋 Deepseek in the left navigation bar to configure
en.task_help: Clear current page content and create a new task
en.instruction_1: 1. Enter your task in the input box, and the Agent will plan the task
en.instruction_2: 2. Response time may be longer under non-streaming output
en.instruction_3: 3. For learning and research purposes only, not suitable for actual trading
en.api_key_note:
All remotely hosted MCPs use limited default API_KEYs

If you encounter issues or need to add other tools, please modify in mcp_config.json
